Usage: floe platform [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

  Platform team commands for governance and deployment.

Options:
  -h, --help  Show this message and exit.

Commands:
  compile   Compile FloeSpec and Manifest into CompiledArtifacts (FR-010).
  deploy    Deploy platform to environment (FR-018).
  lock      Lock an environment to prevent promotions (FR-035).
  promote   Promote an artifact from one environment to the next (FR-001).
  publish   Publish compiled artifacts to registry (FR-017).
  rollback  Rollback an environment to a previous artifact version (FR-013).
  status    Query artifact promotion status across environments (FR-023).
  test      Run platform tests (FR-016).
  unlock    Unlock an environment to allow promotions (FR-037).
